abstract: NFL Roundup; Buffalo Bills name Kathryn Smith as special teams quality control coach; appointment makes her first full-time female coach in NFL history; other football news noted.

headline.print_headline: Buffalo Adds Woman to Coaching Staff
headline.main: Buffalo Adds Woman to Coaching Staff

snippet: Kathryn Smith, named as Buffalo’s special teams quality control coach, becomes the first full-time female member of an N.F.L. coaching staff.
lead_paragraph: Kathryn Smith, named as Buffalo’s special teams quality control coach, becomes the first full-time female member of an N.F.L. coaching staff.
